items.question: Is it really free?
items.answer: Yes. The free plan includes 3 meetings per week with real-time transcription and AI summaries. The Pro plan unlocks unlimited meetings, permanent history, and advanced features like Ask Aura.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Yes. Transcription is processed directly on your device and audio is never sent to servers. When you use features like Ask Aura, text data is sent encrypted with TLS 1.3. We comply with Apple and Google privacy policies.

items.question: Does it work offline?
items.answer: Transcription works 100% offline thanks to the on-device AI engine. Advanced features like insights, Ask Aura, and Weekly Digest require an internet connection.

items.question: What languages are supported?
items.answer: We support 99 languages for transcription, including English, Spanish, Portuguese, French, German, Japanese, Mandarin Chinese, and many more.

items.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
items.answer: You can cancel anytime from the App Store or Google Play. No penalties, hidden fees, or lock-in periods.
